channel.title: potato chips on Tobyblog
channel.description: Recent content in potato chips on Tobyblog

item.title: Cajun Treats
item.description: This video is something of a personal achievement, having been now just under two years in the making, and passing, as it does, yet another milestone in the revitalization of this little blog. Yeah, I know, that’s sort of a grandiose way to introduce a video where I discuss the merits of quail eggs and potato chips with friends and family, but there we are. It means something to me — hard to quantify — to be active on the site again.

item.title: Top 10 Review the World Episodes of 2015-2016
item.description: It’s that time of year again folks, that magical time between Christmas and New Year where thoughtful commentators like myself come out with their end of year retrospectives; and continuing a tradition I established a couple of years back on this site, I intend to give you my take on the best of my buddy Brian Hammons' output over on the internet’s most beloved nostalgia blog, ReviewTheWorld.com. You can catch up on previous years' content by taking a look at my other lists:

item.title: Snickers Varieties and Lays Cappuccino Chips
item.description: To celebrate the recent one year anniversary of our father/son Tumblr site, TheVCubeSolver and I teamed up to review an assortment of Snickers bars we found at CVS. And as a special bonus, we take a look at the trendy new Lays Cappuccino potato chips. Enjoy.
